CONFIG_ARM_SMMU_QCOM.comment: Allow support of QCom SMMU, because why not?

CONFIG_ARM_SMMU_QCOM_DEBUG.comment: Allow support of QCom SMMU, because why not?

CONFIG_BINFMT_MISC.comment: Needed for customer and HCI scenarios

CONFIG_BLK_CGROUP_IOLATENCY.comment: Enable support for latency based cgroup IO protection

CONFIG_BLK_DEV_SX8.comment: The sx8 block driver removed in update to 5.15.118.1 for CBL-Mariner-Linux-Kernel

CONFIG_BPF_LSM.comment: Allow customers to use BPF LSM programs

CONFIG_CC_CAN_LINK_STATIC.comment: Remove static linking support from the kernel

CONFIG_COMPAT_32BIT_TIME.comment: Avoid error that 2 bit get_time syscalls aren't available

CONFIG_CONSOLE_LOGLEVEL_DEFAULT.comment: Needed to see early logging in serial console

CONFIG_CPU_SRSO.comment: Needed for kernel upgrade 5.15.125.1. Enables the SRSO mitigation for speculative RAS overflow

CONFIG_CUSE.comment: Enable CUSE to support Nvidia rshim interface for Azure Linux hosts

CONFIG_DECNET.comment: DECNET support removed in update to 5.15.118.1 for CBL-Mariner-Linux-Kernel

CONFIG_DECNET_NF_GRABULATOR.comment: DECNET support removed in update to 5.15.118.1 for CBL-Mariner-Linux-Kernel

CONFIG_DECNET_ROUTER.comment: DECNET support removed in update to 5.15.118.1 for CBL-Mariner-Linux-Kernel

CONFIG_FPGA_DFL_AFU.comment: Needs to be off for CVE-2023-26242

CONFIG_FTRACE_SYSCALLS.comment: Needed to enable eBPF CO-RE syscalls tracers

CONFIG_FW_LOADER_COMPRESS.comment: QLogic NIC firmware in linux-firmware is compressed

CONFIG_GDS_FORCE_MITIGATION.comment: Needed for kernel upgrade 5.15.125.1. Off to prevent AVX being disabled

CONFIG_INIT_ON_FREE_DEFAULT_ON.comment: Creates increased boot times and errors on large memory systems

CONFIG_IP_VS_MH.comment: Add additional mh scheduler for ipvs per suggestion by customer

CONFIG_MCTP.comment: Do not enable mctp unless fix for CVE-2023-3439 is present

CONFIG_NETFILTER_XT_TARGET_TRACE.comment: Needed for the iptables TRACE target and HCI scenarios

CONFIG_NET_CLS_FLOWER.comment: Needed for customer and HCI scenarios

CONFIG_PHY_TEGRA_XUSB.comment: Needs to be off for CVE-2023-23000

CONFIG_PTP_1588_CLOCK_KVM.comment: Removes error boot message 'failed to initialize ptp kvm'

CONFIG_VCC.comment: Needs to be off for CVE-2023-23039

CONFIG_VFIO_NOIOMMU.comment: VMs may not have access to iommu

CONFIG_VIRTIO_FS.comment: Needed to see logs in Azure serial console

CONFIG_X86_IOPL_IOPERM.comment: Needed for customer to avoid segfault with AMBIOS

CONFIG_ZRAM.comment: Enable ZRAM to align ARM and AMD offerings
